official_title: A concurrent resolution commending the men and women of the Loyal Order of Moose who together have given 100 years of civic, charitable, and benevolent service to their fellow citizens in the finest spirit of American voluntarism.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress commends a named fraternal organization on its 100th anniversary.
